member.name: T:Ninject.Integration.AjaxPro.AjaxPageBase
member.summary: A that is injected not only when loaded in a browser, but also during AJAX calls.

member.name: M:Ninject.Integration.AjaxPro.AjaxPageBase.InitializeContext(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: Initializes the page with the specified context during an AJAX call.
member.param: The context in which the AJAX call is occurring.

member.name: P:Ninject.Integration.AjaxPro.AjaxPageBase.IsAjaxCall
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the code is executing within the context of an AJAX call.

member.name: P:Ninject.Integration.AjaxPro.AjaxPageBase.Context
member.summary: Gets the object associated with the page.
member.returns: An object that contains information associated with the current page.
